price: Na ama mwenye kufanya ubakhili, na asiwe na haja ya wenzake!
footnotes: Ama mwenye kufanya ubakhili kwa mali yake asitoe haki ya Mwenyezi Mungu iliomo humo, na akawa hana haja na yatokayo kwa Mwenyezi Mungu,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: and considers himself free from need
